name: Skorupi
flavorText:
It grips prey with its tail claws
and injects poison. It tenaciously
hangs on until the poison takes.

previous.name: Hippowdon
previous.flavorText:
It blasts internally stored sand
from ports on its body to create
a towering twister for attack.

next.name: Drapion
next.flavorText:
It has the power in its clawed
arms to make scrap of a car. The
tips of its claws release poison.
